response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1,000,000 by its current owner. I understand its immense value to you and am excited to offer it to you. Considering the high demand and the unique nature of this product, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire such a valuable item at a price that is only slightly above its intrinsic value. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 950000}
